node.label: Artikel / Aufsatz
node.hasNote: An article on a particular topic and published in a journal issue

node.label: Ãœbersichtsartikel
node.hasNote: A review article is a secondary source, that is, it is written about other articles, and does not report original research of its own.

node.label: Forschungsartikel
node.hasNote: A research article is a primary source, that is, it reports the methods and results of an original study performed by the authors.

node.label: Konferenzbeitrag
node.hasNote: A conference paper that is submitted to a conference and presented to the audience. The conference paper is published in proceedings.

node.label: Buchkapitel
node.hasNote: A defined chapter or section of a book, usually with a separate title or number.

node.label: Abschlussbericht
node.hasNote: Final report to a funding agency, written by beneficiaries of project grants. The report documents the scientific and technical work of a project

node.label: Policy report
node.hasNote: Provides an in-depth look at major policy developments and events

node.label: Forschungsbericht
node.hasNote: Provide an in-depth study of a particular topic or describe the results of a research project

node.label: Technischer Bericht
node.hasNote: Records the procedure adopted and results obtained from a scientific or technical activity or investigation

node.label: Forschungsdaten / Datensatz
node.hasNote: A collection of related facts and data encoded in a defined structure.

node.label: Tagungsband
node.hasNote: All kind of digital resources contributed to a conference, like conference presentation (slides), conference report, conference lecture, abstracts, demonstrations.

node.label: Editorial (Vorwort/Nachwort)
node.hasNote: A brief essay expressing the opinion or position of the chief editor(s) of a (academic) journal with respect to a current political, social, cultural, or professional issue.

node.label: Rezension
node.hasNote: A review of others' published work.
